description:
os: do not use hosts file for windows tests

Not everyone has the file (http://golang.org/issue/4723#c4).

Update issue 4723.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM
 On Feb 12, 2013 6:05 PM, <alex.brainman@gmail.com> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> os: do not use hosts file for windows tests
>
> Not everyone has the file (http://golang.org/issue/4723#**c4<http://golang.org/issue/4723#c4>
> ).
>
> Update issue 4723.
>
> Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.**com/7311091/<https://codereview.appspot.com/7311091/>
>
> Affected files:
>   M src/pkg/os/os_test.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/os/os_test.go
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/pkg/os/os_test.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/os/os_test.go
> @@ -41,7 +41,6 @@
>                 sd = &sysDir{
>                         Getenv("SystemRoot") + "\\system32\\drivers\\etc",
>                         []string{
> -                               "hosts",
>                                 "networks",
>                                 "protocol",
>                                 "services",
>
>
> --
>
> ---You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google
> Groups "golang-dev" group.

> .

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=140452485d03 ***

Not everyone has the file (http://golang.org/issue/4723#c4).
